sentences.en: A house is not a chattel.
A pledge occurs where there is a transfer of the possession of a chattel ( not ownership ).
sentences.cn: 当有体财产的占有 ( 不是所有权 ) 发生转移时,质押产生.

sentences.en: a society in which women are considered to be chattels
sentences.cn: 视女人为私人财产的社会

sentences.en: Chattel mortgage, has its inner disadvantages in terms of the public summons.
sentences.cn: 动产抵押在公示性上存在着先天缺陷.

sentences.en: Mortgage of chattel is a burgeoning means of guarantee which plays a predominant role in mortgage.
sentences.cn: 动产抵押作为一种新兴的担保方式,在担保物权中独占鳌头.

sentences.en: Only there's a chattel mortgage on my machine equipment.
sentences.cn: 在我的机器设备上只有一项动产抵押.

sentences.en: The division between chattel and estate is the foremost classification of thing in civil law.
sentences.cn: 动产与不动产的划分,是民法上最基本的物的分类.

sentences.en: The paper analyzed the subject conditions of chattel mortgage and China current relative regulations.
sentences.cn: 论文分析了动产抵押标的物的条件和我国现行法上的相关规定.

sentences.en: The third part to analyze the scope of chattel mortgage effect.
sentences.cn: 第三部分分析了动产抵押效力的范围.

trans.tran_en: a piece of personal property that you can move from one place to another
